value:
Hope the kids back at the orphanage
are all right... Probably stuck waiting
around with empty bellies.$k$pWell, time to get out there. This
money isn't gonna earn itself!

The orphanage I'm from never had
much. And when war broke out, the
work dried up, so...I did what I had to.

The caretaker always said, "Rest
comes slowly when rushed." Relax
a little sometime!

There are times when I worry about
whether Lugh has what it takes... At
least I know I can count on Raigh.

Man, the food here sure hits the spot!
Wish I could bring some back to the
orphans... Which reminds me!$k$pI should grab a few more of those
sweets—to share.

I'm Chad. I've got a gift for you from
$Nf. Here ya go.

I gotta get stronger! The orphans are
depending on me.

No time to wait. I've got money to
earn, and standing around's never
earned me much.

Ugh... This is no time to get
tripped up.

For me? Really? Thank you...
I owe ya one.

Name's Chad. I'm not the greatest
fighter, but if you need any locks or
pockets picked, I'm your guy.

I've met all sorts of Heroes since
coming here, but I wonder...why
did they all become warriors?$k$pI needed money, and quick. Cutting
purses, wielding a blade...I did what
it took to get what I needed.$k$pBut there's one thing the caretaker
never let me forget... It is better to
earn than to take.$k$pDoesn't mean much to me when I've
gotta look the orphans in the eyes
when they're cold and hungry, but...$k$pNow I'm just doing what I can here
until I can get back. That's where you
come in. Got work? Let me help.
それっ
いくぜ！
げっ…
くそっ…！
Out of my way!
Gotta keep living...
Take this!
I'll keep my family safe!
No! Why...here?
*bratty laugh*
My name's Chad. I want to fight—so let me help you.
Whoa, hey! Man, you're like the little kids back at the orphanage...
Lugh is almost too kind. I don’t think he could bring himself to really hurt anyone.
Lugh always says that Raigh is nice deep down, but...I think it's just because they're brothers.
I will avenge our caretaker... When Bern's time comes, I'll make sure they pay!
I can't stand to lose any more family—so I'm going to fight.
I might not be the most powerful person here, but...I'll do whatever I can to help.
OK, fine.
You sure?
This is it, then!
